name: vovk-monorepo
description: RESTful RPC for Next.js - Transforms Next.js into a powerful REST API platform with RPC capabilities.

scripts.test: npm --prefix test run generate && npm run lint-nofix && tsc --noemit && tsc --project ./packages/vovk-cli/tsconfig.json --noemit && npm run unit
scripts.unit: PORT=3210 concurrently "sleep 30 && npm run test:unit" "npm run serve:unit" --kill-others --success first
scripts.unit:watch: PORT=3210 concurrently "sleep 30 && npm run test:unit:watch" "npm run serve:unit" --kill-others --success first
scripts.serve:unit: npm --prefix test run generate && npm --prefix test run build && npm --prefix test run start
scripts.patch: npm t && npm version patch && npm run build && npm publish ./dist && git push && git push --tags
scripts.minor: npm t && npm version minor && npm run build && npm publish ./dist && git push && git push --tags
scripts.BREAKING-major: npm t && npm version major && npm run build && npm publish ./dist && git push && git push --tags
scripts.beta: npm t && npm version prerelease --preid=beta && npm run build && npm publish ./dist --tag beta && git push && git push --tags
scripts.beta-notest: npm version prerelease --preid=beta && npm run build && npm publish ./dist --tag beta && git push && git push --tags
scripts.beta-patch: npm t && npm version prepatch --preid=beta && npm run build && npm publish ./dist --tag beta && git push && git push --tags
scripts.beta-minor: npm t && npm version preminor --preid=beta && npm run build && npm publish ./dist --tag beta && git push && git push --tags
scripts.BREAKING-beta-major: npm t && npm version premajor --preid=beta && npm run build && npm publish ./dist --tag beta && git push && git push --tags
scripts.release-explicit-version: npm t && npm version 2.0.0 && npm run build && npm publish ./dist && git push && git push --tags
scripts.version-and-publish: npm version $VERSION_TYPE --no-git-tag-version && git tag $PACKAGE_NAME-v$(node -p "require('./packages/$PACKAGE_NAME/package.json').version") && npm run build && git push && git push --tags

author: Andrii Gubanov
